info.title: eToro Api
info.description:
eToro’s public API provides access to real-time financial data, trading insights, and account management features, allowing developers to integrate eToro’s services into their applications. With access to market prices, historical data, and social trading information, the API empowers users to enhance their trading strategies. Designed for security and scalability, the eToro API ensures smooth and reliable integration for a variety of financial applications.

For more details on integrating with eToro's public WebSocket service, please refer to the dedicated [WebSocket documentation](./websocket/websocket-doc.html).

get.summary: Get curated lists
get.description: Retrieves curated investment lists available to the authenticated user.

get.summary: Get instrument feed posts
get.description: Retrieves feed posts associated with a specific financial instrument. The feed includes discussions, analyses, and other content related to the instrument.

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the financial instrument/market to retrieve feed posts for

parameters.name: requesterUserId
parameters.description: ID of the user making the request. Used for personalization and permission checks.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: Number of feed posts to retrieve. Used for pagination.

parameters.name: badgesExperimentIsEnabled
parameters.description: Flag indicating whether to include user badges in the response. Part of badges feature experiment.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of feed posts to skip. Used for pagination in combination with take parameter.

parameters.name: reactionsPageSize
parameters.description: Number of reactions to include per post. Controls the pagination of post reactions.

post.description: Creates a new discussion post in the feed system. This endpoint allows users to create posts that can be associated with instruments, users, or general discussions.

get.summary: Get user feed posts
get.description: Retrieves feed posts associated with a specific user. The feed includes the user's discussions, analyses, and other content they have posted.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user whose feed posts should be retrieved

parameters.name: requesterUserId
parameters.description: ID of the user making the request. Used for personalization and permission checks.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: Number of feed posts to retrieve. Used for pagination.

parameters.name: badgesExperimentIsEnabled
parameters.description: Flag indicating whether to include user badges in the response. Part of badges feature experiment.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of feed posts to skip. Used for pagination in combination with take parameter.

parameters.name: reactionsPageSize
parameters.description: Number of reactions to include per post. Controls the pagination of post reactions.

get.title: List Supported Exchanges
get.summary: Retrieves a list of exchanges supported by the platform along with basic descriptive data.

parameters.name: exchangeIds
parameters.description: A comma seperated list of exchange ids to retrieve

get.title: Retrieve Instrument Type Definitions
get.summary: Fetch available instrument types (asset classes) such as stocks, ETFs, commodities, etc.

parameters.name: instrumentTypeIds
parameters.description: A comma seperated list of instrument type ids to retrieve

get.title: Get Instrument Display Information
get.summary: Retrieves metadata for specified instruments, including display names, exchange IDs, and classification.

parameters.name: instrumentIds
parameters.description: A comma seperated list of instrument ids to filter on

parameters.name: exchangeIds
parameters.description: A comma seperated list of exchange ids to filter on

parameters.name: stocksIndustryIds
parameters.description: A comma seperated list of stock industry ids to filter on

parameters.name: instrumentTypeIds
parameters.description: A comma seperated list of instrument type ids to filter on

get.summary: Get historical closing prices for all instruments

get.title: Real-Time Market Rates
get.summary: Retrieve current market rates and pricing information for specified instruments
get.description: Provides real-time market data including bid/ask prices, conversion rates, and execution prices for specified financial instruments. Essential for price discovery and trade execution decisions.

parameters.name: instrumentIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of instrument IDs to retrieve market rates for. Each ID represents a unique tradable asset in the system.

400.description: Invalid request - Typically due to invalid instrument IDs or exceeding maximum limit

get.summary: Get historical candles data for an instrument
get.description: Retrieves historical price data in OHLCV (Open, High, Low, Close, Volume) format for a specified instrument. The data is organized into time-based candles of various intervals, from one minute to one week.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Sorting direction of the candles data. Use 'asc' for oldest to newest, or 'desc' for newest to oldest.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Time interval for each candle. Determines the granularity of the price data. Shorter intervals provide more detailed price action but require more data points.

parameters.name: candlesCount
parameters.description: Number of candles to retrieve. Maximum value is 1000. For longer historical periods, consider using a larger time interval or making multiple requests.

parameters.name: instrumentId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the financial instrument to retrieve candles for. This ID is consistent across all eToro systems.

get.summary: Search for Instruments
get.description: Retrieve a list of instruments based on various search criteria. Each field in the response can be utilized as a filter or projection.

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: Text to search for within instrument names.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve for pagination.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. Example: pop=popularityUniques7Day,displayname

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The field to sort by, with direction (asc/desc). Example: popularityUniques7Day desc

200.description: Successful response containing the list of instruments.

get.title: Get Stocks Industries
get.summary: Gets data on available stocks industries

parameters.name: stocksIndustryIds
parameters.description: A comma seperated list of stock industry ids to retrieves

get.summary: Get market recommendations
get.description: Retrieves personalized market recommendations for the authenticated user.

get.summary: Get copiers public info

post.title: Open a limit order
post.summary: Places a Market-if-touched order (similar to Limit order) to open a position when a threshold price is reached.
post.description: A Market-if-touched order is an order to open a new long or short position when a specific price or better appears in the Market. The price threshold is used to trigger a Market Order. This endpoint allows traders to set up Market-if-touched orders with parameters like leverage, stop-loss, and take-profit settings.

InstrumentID.description: The unique identifier of the financial instrument.

IsBuy.description: Indicates whether the order will open a long (true) or short (false) position.

Leverage.description: The leverage ratio for the order.

Amount.description: The amount of the trade in the account currency [USD]. Required if AmountInUnits is not provided.

AmountInUnits.description: The number of units of the asset. Required if Amount is not provided. For most assets this can be a fractional number. Note that for Future Contracts this number should indicate the number of underlying units, and not the number of contracts, according to the formula: AmountInUnits = contract multiplier * number of contracts.

StopLossRate.description: The stop-loss trigger price at which the position will generate a Market Order to close (after it was opened). StopLoss trigger price must be worse than current price.

TakeProfitRate.description: The take-profit trigger price at which the position will generate a Market Order to close (after it has opened). TakeProfit trigger price must be better than the current price.

Rate.description: The trigger price at which a Market order to open the position will be sent for execution. The trigger price must be better than the current price. This means that the trigger price must be lower than current price for Long positions, and higher than current price for Short positions.

IsTslEnabled.description: Indicates if a trailing stop loss (TSL) is enabled. This means that the stoploss rate indicated will get updated automatically whenever the asset price increases (for long positions) or decreases (for short position) effectively keeping the stoploss in a constant gap from the best price achieved so far.

200.description: Market-if-touched order successfully placed. The response includes a confirmation token.

token.description: A confirmation token indicating the order creation.

delete.title: Cancel a Market-if-touched order
delete.summary: Cancels a Market-if-touched order that has not yet been executed.
delete.description: This endpoint allows traders to cancel a Market-if-touched order before it is executed. Once canceled, the order will no longer be processed.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Market-if-touched order to be canceled.

200.description: Successfully canceled the Market-if-touched order. The response includes a confirmation token.

token.description: A confirmation token indicating the order cancellation.

post.title: Send a Market Order to Close a position or a part of it
post.summary: Creates a market order to close a position or partially close it by specifying the number of units to deduct.
post.description: This endpoint allows traders to close an entire position or a portion of it at the current market rate. If `UnitsToDeduct` is provided, only the specified portion will be closed. If `UnitsToDeduct` is omitted or set to null, the full position will be closed.

parameters.name: positionId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the position to close.

InstrumentId.description: The ID of the financial instrument associated with the position.

UnitsToDeduct.description: The number of units to close. If omitted or null, the entire position will be closed.

200.description: Successfully closed a position or a part of it.

positionID.description: The ID of the closed position.

instrumentID.description: The ID of the instrument traded.

unitsToDeduct.description: The number of units closed in this order.

orderID.description: The unique identifier of the closing order.

statusID.description: The status of the closing order.

CID.description: Customer Account ID associated with the order.

openDateTime.description: The timestamp when the order was placed.

lastUpdate.description: The timestamp of the last update to this order.

token.description: A unique confirmation token for the closing order.

delete.title: Cancel a market order for close
delete.summary: Cancels a pending market order for close for the specified order ID.
delete.description: This endpoint allows traders to cancel a previously placed market order for close before execution. If the order has already been processed, cancellation will not be possible.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the market order for close to be canceled.

200.description: Successfully canceled the market order for close. The response includes a confirmation token.

token.description: A confirmation token indicating the order cancellation.

post.title: Place a market order to open a position by amount of cash
post.summary: Create a market order to open a position by specifying the amount of cash you would like to use in the trade.
post.description: This endpoint allows traders to place a market order to open a position by specifying the investment amount instead of specifying the number of units. The trade will be executed at the market price, and leverage, stop-loss, and take-profit settings can be applied.

InstrumentID.description: The unique identifier of the financial instrument to trade.

IsBuy.description: True for a long position, false for a short position.

Leverage.description: The leverage multiplier for the trade.

Amount.description: The amount of money to invest in the trade.

StopLossRate.description: The stop-loss trigger price at which the position will generate a Market Order to close (after it was opened). StopLoss trigger price must be worse than current price.

TakeProfitRate.description: The take-profit trigger price at which the position will generate a Market Order to close (after it has opened). TakeProfit trigger price must be better than the current price.

IsTslEnabled.description: Indicates if a trailing stop loss (TSL) is enabled. This means that the stoploss rate indicated will get updated automatically whenever the asset price increases (for long positions) or decreases (for short position) effectively keeping the stoploss in a constant gap from the best price achieved so far.

IsNoStopLoss.description: True if no stop-loss is set for this order.

IsNoTakeProfit.description: True if no take-profit is set for this order.

instrumentID.description: The ID of the traded instrument.

isBuy.description: True for a long position, false for a short position.

leverage.description: The leverage applied to the trade.

stopLossRate.description: The stop-loss threshold rate, if applicable.

takeProfitRate.description: The take-profit thereshold rate, if applicable.

isTslEnabled.description: Indicates if trailing stop-loss is enabled.

mirrorID.description: ID related to mirrored trades, if applicable.

totalExternalCosts.description: Total external costs associated with opening the trade.

CID.description: Customer ID associated with the order.

openDateTime.description: The timestamp when the order was opened.

lastUpdate.description: The last update timestamp of the order.

token.description: A unique confirmation token for the order.

post.title: Place a market order to open a position by number of units
post.summary: Places a Market Order to open a position by specifying the number of units you would like to trade.
post.description: This endpoint allows traders to place a market order to open a position by specifying the number of units (rather than an amount in cash). The trade is executed at the current market price, and optional settings like leverage, stop-loss, and take-profit can be applied.

InstrumentID.description: The unique identifier of the financial instrument to trade.

IsBuy.description: True for a long position, false for a short position.

Leverage.description: The leverage multiplier for the trade.

AmountInUnits.description: The number of units of the asset. Required if Amount is not provided. For most assets this can be a fractional number. Note that for Future Contracts this number should indicate the number of underlying units, and not the number of contracts, according to the formula: AmountInUnits = contract multiplier * number of contracts.

StopLossRate.description: The stop-loss trigger price at which the position will generate a Market Order to close (after it was opened). StopLoss trigger price must be worse than current price.

TakeProfitRate.description: The take-profit trigger price at which the position will generate a Market Order to close (after it has opened). TakeProfit trigger price must be better than the current price.

IsTslEnabled.description: Indicates if a trailing stop loss (TSL) is enabled. This means that the stoploss rate indicated will get updated automatically whenever the asset price increases (for long positions) or decreases (for short position) effectively keeping the stoploss in a constant gap from the best price achieved so far.

IsNoStopLoss.description: True if no stop-loss is set for this order.

IsNoTakeProfit.description: True if no take-profit is set for this order.

instrumentID.description: The ID of the traded instrument.

amount.description: The amount invested in the trade.

isBuy.description: True for a long position, false for a short position.

leverage.description: The leverage applied to the trade.

stopLossRate.description: The stop-loss threshold rate, if applicable.

takeProfitRate.description: The take-profit thereshold rate, if applicable.

isTslEnabled.description: Indicates if trailing stop-loss is enabled.

mirrorID.description: ID related to mirrored trades, if applicable.

totalExternalCosts.description: Total external costs associated with the trade.

lotCount.description: The number of lots in the order.

CID.description: Customer Account ID associated with the order.

openDateTime.description: The timestamp when the order was opened.

lastUpdate.description: The last update timestamp of the order.

token.description: A unique confirmation token for the order.

delete.title: Cancel a pending market order for open
delete.summary: Cancels a market order for open before it is executed.
delete.description: This endpoint allows traders to cancel a market order for open before execution. If the order has already been processed, cancellation will not be possible.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the market order for open to be canceled.

200.description: Successfully canceled the pending market order. The response includes a confirmation token.

token.description: A confirmation token indicating the order cancellation.

get.summary: Get Demo Account PnL and Portfolio Details
get.description: Retrieves the demo account's current portfolio, including credit, open positions, orders, mirrors, and PnL details.

200.description: Successfully retrieved demo account PnL and portfolio information.

get.title: Portfolio Management Dashboard
get.summary: Retrieve comprehensive portfolio information including positions, orders, and account status
get.description: Returns detailed portfolio information including active positions, pending orders, mirror trading details, and account balances. This endpoint provides a complete overview of the user's trading activity and current market exposure.

get.title: Portfolio Management Dashboard
get.summary: Retrieve comprehensive portfolio information including positions, orders, and account status
get.description: Returns detailed portfolio information including active positions, pending orders, mirror trading details, and account balances. This endpoint provides a complete overview of the user's trading activity and current market exposure.

get.summary: Get Real Account PnL and Portfolio Details
get.description: Retrieves the real account's current portfolio, including credit, open positions, orders, mirrors, and PnL details.

200.description: Successfully retrieved real account PnL and portfolio information.

get.summary: List trading history

parameters.name: minDate
parameters.description: The start date of the period you would like to view.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The amount of trades in each page.

netProfit.description: The net profit of the trade

closeRate.description: The closing rate of the trade

closeTimestamp.description: The closing timestamp of the trade

positionId.description: The position ID of the trade

instrumentId.description: The instrument ID of the instrument that was traded

isBuy.description: Indicates if the trade was a buy or sell

leverage.description: The leverage used in the trade

openRate.description: The opening rate of the trade

openTimestamp.description: The opening timestamp of the trade

stopLossRate.description: The stop loss rate of the trade

takeProfitRate.description: The take profit rate of the trade

trailingStopLoss.description: Indicates if the trade had a trailing stop loss

orderId.description: The order ID of the trade

socialTradeId.description: The social trade ID of the trade

parentPositionId.description: The parent position ID of the trade

investment.description: The investment amount of the trade

initialInvestment.description: The initial investment amount of the trade

get.title: User Profile and Aggregated Information for public users
get.summary: Retrieve comprehensive user profile data and aggregated account information
get.description: Returns detailed user profile information including account status, verification levels, biographical data, and associated metadata. This endpoint aggregates essential user information from multiple sources to provide a complete user profile overview.

400.description: Invalid request - Typically due to exceeding maximum usernames limit or invalid username format

404.description: One or more requested usernames not found

get.title: Advanced User Discovery and Analytics Platform
get.summary: Comprehensive search and analytics engine for user discovery and analysis
get.description: Powerful search platform that enables advanced user discovery with comprehensive filtering capabilities. Supports complex queries across multiple dimensions including performance metrics, risk profiles, investment patterns, and account characteristics. Ideal for identifying users based on specific trading behaviors and performance criteria.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Defines the time period for analyzing user metrics and performance data. Supports various predefined intervals for consistent analysis.

parameters.name: isTestAccount
parameters.description: When set to true, filters results to include only test/demo accounts. When false, shows only live accounts. Optional filter.

parameters.name: optIn
parameters.description: Filter for users who have explicitly opted in to specific features or programs. Used for compliance and feature-specific filtering.

parameters.name: blocked
parameters.description: When true, includes only blocked accounts in the results. Used for compliance and risk management purposes.

parameters.name: countryId
parameters.description: The registered country ID of the user

parameters.name: instrumentId
parameters.description: The instrument ID (you can also use this to exclude an instrument e.g., -5).

parameters.name: instrumentPctMin
parameters.description: Minimum percentage of investment in the requested instrument ID.

parameters.name: instrumentPctMax
parameters.description: Maximum percentage of investment in the requested instrument ID.

get.title: Period-Specific Performance Metrics
get.summary: Retrieve granular performance data for specific time periods
get.description: Provides detailed performance analytics including daily gains, cumulative returns, and period-specific metrics within a specified date range. Supports various time-based analyses and performance reporting requirements.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the user whose performance data is being requested

parameters.name: minDate
parameters.description: Start date for the analysis period (inclusive) in YYYY-MM-DD format

parameters.name: maxDate
parameters.description: End date for the analysis period (inclusive) in YYYY-MM-DD format

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specifies the granularity of the performance data: 'Daily' for day-by-day metrics or 'Period' for aggregated period statistics

get.title: Historical Performance Analytics
get.summary: Retrieve detailed historical performance metrics and analytics for a specified user
get.description: Returns comprehensive historical monthly and yearly performance data including gain percentages, risk-adjusted returns, and detailed trading statistics. This endpoint provides both aggregated and time-series performance metrics.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the user whose performance metrics are being requested

get.summary: Get the live portfolio of a user

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user to retrieve the live portfolio for.

realizedCreditPct.description: Credit as a percentage of the realized credit

unrealizedCreditPct.description: Credit as a percentage of the unrealized credit

get.summary: Get trade info for a specific user

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user to retrieve the discovery info for.

countryId.description: The registered country ID of the user

affiliateId.description: The affiliate ID of the user

isPopularInvestor.description: Is the customer a popular investor

isFund.description: Does this customer represent a fund

hasAvatar.description: Does the customer have a picture

gain.description: The periodic gain of the user

thisWeekGain.description: The user's gain from the beginning of the trading week

riskScore.description: The current risk score of the user

maxDailyRiskScore.description: The maximum daily risk score of the user in this interval

maxMonthlyRiskScore.description: The maximum monthly risk score of the user in this interval

copiers.description: The current number of copiers of this user

copiedTrades.description: The total number of copied trades in this interval

copyTradesPct.description: The percentage of copied trades in this interval of all trades

copyInvestmentPct.description: The percentage of invested amounts in copied trades in this interval of all investments

baseLineCopiers.description: The number of copiers one week ago

copiersGain.description: The gain percentage of the number of copiers in a week

aumTier.description: The total assets under management of the user, in a scale of 0-4, where 4 is the highest tier

virtualCopiers.description: The total amount of virtual copiers of this user

trades.description: The total number of trades in this interval

topTradedInstrumentId.description: Top Traded Instrument ID in this interval

topTradedAssetId.description: Top Traded Asset ID in this interval

winRatio.description: The winning ratio of all closed trades in this interval

dailyDd.description: The maximum daily draw-down of the user in this interval

weeklyDd.description: The maximum weekly draw-down of this user in this interval

peakToValley.description: The peak to valley draw-down in this interval

profitableWeeksPct.description: The percentage of trading weeks which were profitable in this interval

profitableMonthsPct.description: The percentage of months which were profitable in this interval

avgPosSize.description: Average position size relative to the realized equity on opening the trade

highLeveragePct.description: High leverage trades percentage in this interval

mediumLeveragePct.description: Medium leverage trades percentage in this interval

lowLeveragePct.description: Low leverage trades percentage in this interval

firstActivity.description: Number of days since the beginning of the interval of a user trading activity

lastActivity.description: Number of days from the last trading activity till the end of the interval

activeWeeksPct.description: The percentage of weeks in the interval which the user had active trades

instrumentPct.description: Percentage of investment in the requested instrument ID

get.summary: Get user watchlists
get.description: Retrieves all watchlists for the authenticated user with optional pagination and built-in watchlist management.

parameters.name: itemsPerPageForSingle
parameters.description: Number of items to include per watchlist for pagination

parameters.name: ensureBuiltinWatchlists
parameters.description: Whether to ensure built-in watchlists are included

parameters.name: addRelatedAssets
parameters.description: Whether to include related assets in the response

post.description: Creates a new watchlist for the authenticated user with the specified name and type.

parameters.name: dynamicQuery
parameters.description: Dynamic query URL for dynamic watchlists

post.summary: Create default watchlist with selected items
post.description: Creates a default watchlist populated with the specified items.

requestBody.description: Items to include in the default watchlist

get.summary: Get default watchlist items
get.description: Retrieves items from user's default watchlists with optional pagination.

parameters.name: itemsLimit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: Number of items per page for pagination

post.summary: Create watchlist and set as default
post.description: Creates a new watchlist and immediately sets it as the user's default watchlist.

201.description: Watchlist created and set as default successfully

get.summary: Get user's public watchlists
get.description: Retrieves all public watchlists for a specific user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID whose public watchlists to retrieve

get.summary: Get single public watchlist
get.description: Retrieves a specific public watchlist from a user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID who owns the watchlist

put.description: Updates the display rank of a watchlist.

parameters.name: newRank
parameters.description: New rank position for the watchlist

put.summary: Set a specific watchlist as user's default
put.description: Sets the specified watchlist as the user's default watchlist.

parameters.name: watchlistId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the watchlist to set as default

get.summary: Get single watchlist
get.description: Retrieves a specific watchlist with its items using pagination.

put.description: Updates the name of an existing watchlist.

delete.description: Removes a watchlist and all its items.

parameters.name: watchlistId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the watchlist to delete

post.description: Adds new items to an existing watchlist.

requestBody.description: Items to add to the watchlist

put.description: Updates existing items in a watchlist (rank, etc.).

requestBody.description: Items to update in the watchlist

delete.description: Removes specified items from a watchlist.

requestBody.description: Items to remove from the watchlist

PublicAggregatedInfoResponse.description: Container for the aggregated user information response

Users.description: Array of user profiles with their associated information

PublicAggregatedInfoUser.description: Comprehensive user profile information including account details, verification status, and preferences

gcid.description: Global Customer ID - Unique identifier across all systems

realCID.description: Customer ID for real trading account

demoCID.description: Customer ID for demo/practice account if available

username.description: Unique username identifier for the user

language.description: User's preferred language ID based on system language codes

languageIsoCode.description: ISO 639-1 language code for user's preferred language

country.description: User's registered country ID based on system country codes

allowDisplayFullName.description: Indicates whether the user has consented to displaying their full name publicly

userBio.description: Structured biographical information including trading strategy

whiteLabel.description: White label partner identifier if user belongs to a partner program

optOut.description: Indicates if user has opted out of public profile features

isPi.description: Indicates if user is a Professional Investor with special privileges

verificationLevel.description: User's current verification level (0-3, where 3 is fully verified)

accountStatus.description: Current account status code indicating active, suspended, or other states

instrumentId.description: The ID of the instrument to trade.

isBuy.description: Indicates if the order is a buy (true) or sell (false).

leverage.description: The leverage level for the trade.

investment.description: The amount of money invested in the trade.

units.description: The number of units being traded.

orderType.description: The type of order (Market or Limit).

executionType.description: The execution type of the order (Good-Till-Canceled or Immediate-Or-Cancel).

limitRate.description: The limit price for limit orders.

isTrailingStopLoss.description: Indicates if the stop-loss is trailing.

leverage.description: The leverage level for the trade.

investment.description: The amount of money invested in the trade.

openTimestamp.description: The timestamp of the order creation.

isEntry.description: Indicates if the order is an entry or exit order.

orderType.description: The type of order (Market or Limit).

executionType.description: The execution type of the order (Good-Till-Canceled or Immediate-Or-Cancel).

limitRate.description: The limit price for limit orders.

instrumentId.description: The ID of the instrument to trade.

units.description: The number of units being traded.

executionType.description: The execution type of the order (Good-Till-Canceled or Immediate-Or-Cancel).

positionId.description: The ID of the position to close.
The Id of the position being closed.

orderID.description: The Id of the exit order.

openDateTime.description: The timestamp of the order creation.

socialTradeId.description: The Id of the social trade being closed.

LiveRatesResponse.description: Container for real-time market rates data

rates.description: Array of current market rates for requested instruments

instrumentID.description: Unique identifier for the financial instrument

ask.description: Current asking price (offer) for the instrument. This is the price at which you can buy the asset.

bid.description: Current bid price for the instrument. This is the price at which you can sell the asset.

lastExecution.description: Price of the most recent trade execution for this instrument

conversionRateAsk.description: Current conversion rate (ask) from instrument's currency to USD, used for position value calculations

conversionRateBid.description: Current conversion rate (bid) from instrument's currency to USD, used for position value calculations

date.description: The date-time of the price in the system

unitMargin.description: (Obsolete) USD equivalent of the instrument price

unitMarginAsk.description: (Obsolete) USD equivalent of the instrument ask price

unitMarginBid.description: (Obsolete) USD equivalent of the instrument bid price

PortfolioResponse.description: Comprehensive portfolio information including positions, orders, and account status

positions.description: List of currently open trading positions

cid.description: Customer ID associated with the position

openDateTime.description: Timestamp when the position was opened in ISO 8601 format

openRate.description: Entry price of the position in the instrument's currency

isBuy.description: Position direction: true for long (buy) positions, false for short (sell) positions

leverage.description: Leverage multiplier applied to the position

takeProfitRate.description: The take-profit trigger price at which the position will generate a Market Order to close (after it has opened). TakeProfit trigger price must be better than the current price.

stopLossRate.description: The stop-loss trigger price at which the position will generate a Market Order to close (after it was opened). StopLoss trigger price must be worse than current price.

amount.description: USD amount allocated to the position. This amount includes both the initial investment, and additional margin allocated to the position as collateral

orderId.description: Original orderId the position was opened by. Need to match together with orderType

orderType.description: Original orderType of the order the position was opened by. Need to match together with orderId

units.description: Number of units in the position

totalFees.description: Total overnight fees and dividends charged/paid on the position in USD. Negative amount represents refund

initialAmountInDollars.description: Initial investment USD amount in the position

isTslEnabled.description: Indication if TrailingStopLoss feature is active on this position

stopLossVersion.description: Manual stop loss edit version. Each time StopLossRate is manually update this value is incremented

redeemStatusId.description: If the position is currently in redeem process, this value represents the current status

initialUnits.description: Initial invested units in the position

isPartiallyAltered.description: Indication whether this position was partially closed

unitsBaseValueDollars.description: Current units invested value in USD

settlementTypeId.description: Position investment type. 0 - CFD, 1 - Real Asset, 2 - SWAP, 3 - Crypto MarginTrade, 4 - Future Contract

isDetached.description: Indication if the position was originally opened inside a mirror and detached from it

pnlVersion.description: Pnl formula used for calculating profit and loss

totalExternalFees.description: Total fees in USD charged on the position. Example - TicketFee. This value does not include overnight fees and dividends

totalExternalTaxes.description: Total taxes in USD charged on the position. Example - SDRT

isNoTakeProfit.description: Indication if TakeProfit is enabled for the position. false = enabled, true = disabled

isNoStopLoss.description: Indication if StopLoss is enabled for the position. false = enabled, true = disabled

lotCount.description: Number of lots the position represents. For FutureContracts this value represents the number of contracts acquired

credit.description: Available trading balance in USD, representing funds available for new positions

mirrorId.description: Unique identifier for the mirror trading configuration

cid.description: Customer ID associated with the mirror

parentCid.description: Customer ID of the trader being copied

stopLossPercentage.description: The precentage of the mirror value that the StopLossAmount represented at the time of the last edit. Adding or removing funds from the mirror will trigger recalculation of StopLossAmount based on this value compared to the current mirror value

isPaused.description: Indication if the mirror is currently paused, restricting open of additional positions inside the mirror

copyExistingPositions.description: Indication if mirror originally copied all parent existing position on mirror registration

availableAmount.description: Available to trade USD balance in the mirror. This balance is reserved for mirror operations

stopLossAmount.description: USD value of the mirror at which MirrorStopLoss will be triggered and cause liquidation of the mirror. Adding or removing funds from the mirror will trigger recalculation of this value based on StopLossPercentage compared to the current mirror value

initialInvestment.description: USD amount initially invested in the mirror

depositSummary.description: Total USD amount deposited into the mirror after initial investment

withdrawalSummary.description: Total USD amount withdrawn from the mirror

parentUsername.description: Username of the trader being copied

closedPositionsNetProfit.description: Total USD net profit of all positions that closed in the mirror

startedCopyDate.description: Date and time when the mirror trading was initiated

pendingForClosure.description: Indication if the mirror is in closure process

ordersForOpen.description: Active orders in the mirror to open positions

ordersForClose.description: Active orders in the mirror to close positions

ordersForCloseMultiple.description: Active orders in the mirror to close positions

mirrorStatusId.description: Current status of the mirror. 0 - Active, 1 - Paused, 2 - Pending Closure, 3 - In Alignment Process

cid.description: Customer ID associated with the order

openDateTime.description: Date and time when the order was created

instrumentId.description: Identifier of the instrument being traded

isBuy.description: Direction of the position. true - Long, false - Short

takeProfitRate.description: The take-profit trigger price at which the position will generate a Market Order to close (after it has opened). TakeProfit trigger price must be better than the current price.

stopLossRate.description: The stop-loss trigger price at which the position will generate a Market Order to close (after it was opened). StopLoss trigger price must be worse than current price.

rate.description: Asset rate at which to send market order to the market

amount.description: USD amount to invest in the position

leverage.description: Leverage multiplier to apply to the position

units.description: Units to open the position. If this value is greater than zero the position will open on the requested units, and not amount

isTslEnabled.description: Indicates if a trailing stop loss (TSL) is enabled. This means that the stoploss rate indicated will get updated automatically whenever the asset price increases (for long positions) or decreases (for short position) effectively keeping the stoploss in a constant gap from the best price achieved so far.

ordersForCloseMultiple.description: Active orders to close multiple positions

bonusCredit.description: Bonus credit amount in USD available for trading

positions.description: List of currently open trading positions

credit.description: Available trading balance in USD, representing funds available for new actions

ordersForCloseMultiple.description: Active orders to close multiple positions

bonusCredit.description: Bonus credit amount in USD in the account

cid.description: Customer ID associated with the position

openDateTime.description: Timestamp when the position was opened in ISO 8601 format

openRate.description: Entry price of the position in the instrument's currency

isBuy.description: Position direction: true for long (buy) positions, false for short (sell) positions

takeProfitRate.description: Rate at which TakeProfit will trigger and send MarketOrder to close the position

stopLossRate.description: Rate at which StopLoss will trigger and send MarketOrder to close the position

amount.description: USD amount allocated to the position. This amount includes both the initial investment, and additional margin allocated to the position as collateral

leverage.description: Leverage multiplier applied to the position

orderId.description: Original orderId the position was opened by. Need to match together with orderType

orderType.description: Original orderType of the order the position was opened by. Need to match together with orderId

units.description: Number of units in the position

totalFees.description: Total overnight fees and dividends charged/paid on the position in USD. Negative amount represents refund

initialAmountInDollars.description: Initial investment USD amount in the position. This value does not change in case the position was partially closed

isTslEnabled.description: Indication if TrailingStopLoss feature is active on this position

stopLossVersion.description: Manual stop loss edit version. Each time StopLossRate is manually update this value is incremented

redeemStatusId.description: If the position is currently in redeem process, this value represents the current status

initialUnits.description: Initial invested units in the position. This value does not change in case the position was partially closed

isPartiallyAltered.description: Indication whether this position was partially closed

unitsBaseValueDollars.description: USD value of the current units in the position, based on the initial investment. If the position was not partially altered, this value equals initialAmountInDollars

isDiscounted.description: Obsolete. This value is used to indicate if the relevant prices for the position are Ask/Bid or AskDiscounted/BidDiscounted

settlementTypeId.description: Position investment type. 0 - CFD, 1 - Real Asset, 2 - SWAP, 3 - Crypto MarginTrade, 4 - Future Contract

isDetached.description: Indication if the position was originally opened inside a mirror and detached from it

openConversionRate.description: Conversion rate from the asset currency to USD at the time the position was opened

pnlVersion.description: Pnl formula used for calculating profit and loss

totalExternalFees.description: Total fees in USD charged on the position. Example - TicketFee. This value does not include overnight fees and dividends

totalExternalTaxes.description: Total taxes in USD charged on the position. Example - SDRT

isNoTakeProfit.description: Indication if TakeProfit is enabled for the position. false = enabled, true = disabled

isNoStopLoss.description: Indication if StopLoss is enabled for the position. false = enabled, true = disabled

lotCount.description: Number of lots the position represents. For FutureContracts, this value represents the number of contracts acquired. This property is not relevant for instruments that are not futures instruments

cid.description: Customer ID associated with the mirror

parentCid.description: Customer ID of the trader being copied

stopLossPercentage.description: The precentage of the mirror value that the StopLossAmount represented at the time of the last edit. Adding or removing funds from the mirror will trigger recalculation of StopLossAmount based on this value compared to the current mirror value

isPaused.description: Indication if the mirror is currently paused, restricting open of additional positions inside the mirror

copyExistingPositions.description: Indication if mirror originally copied all parent existing position on mirror registration

availableAmount.description: Available to trade USD balance in the mirror. This balance is reserved for mirror operations

stopLossAmount.description: USD value of the mirror at which MirrorStopLoss will be triggered and cause liquidation of the mirror. Adding or removing funds from the mirror will trigger recalculation of this value based on StopLossPercentage compared to the current mirror value

initialInvestment.description: USD amount initially invested in the mirror

depositSummary.description: Total USD amount deposited into the mirror after initial investment

withdrawalSummary.description: Total USD amount withdrawn from the mirror

positions.description: List of currently open trading positions in the mirror

parentUsername.description: Username of the trader being copied

closedPositionsNetProfit.description: Total USD net profit of all positions that closed in the mirror

startedCopyDate.description: Date and time when the mirror trading was initiated

pendingForClosure.description: Indication if the mirror is in closure process

parentMirrors.description: Parent mirrors for this mirror (if any)

ordersForOpen.description: Active orders in the mirror to open positions

ordersForClose.description: Active orders in the mirror to close positions

ordersForCloseMultiple.description: Active orders in the mirror to close positions

mirrorStatusId.description: Current status of the mirror. 0 - Active, 1 - Paused, 2 - Pending Closure, 3 - In Alignment Process

cid.description: Customer ID associated with the order

openDateTime.description: Date and time when the order was created

instrumentId.description: Identifier of the instrument being traded

isBuy.description: Direction of the position. true - Long, false - Short

takeProfitRate.description: Rate at which TakeProfit will trigger and send MarketOrder to close the position once it is open

stopLossRate.description: Rate at which StopLoss will trigger and send MarketOrder to close the position once it is open

rate.description: Asset rate at which to send market order to the market

amount.description: USD amount to invest in the position

units.description: Units to open the position. If this value is greater than zero the position will open on the requested units, and not amount

isTslEnabled.description: Indication if to enable TSL feature on the position once it is open

isNoTakeProfit.description: Indication if TakeProfit is enabled for the order. false = enabled, true = disabled

cid.description: Customer ID associated with the order

openDateTime.description: The timestamp when the order was opened.

lastUpdate.description: The last update timestamp of the order.

instrumentId.description: The unique identifier of the financial instrument to trade.

amount.description: The amount of money to invest in the trade.

amountInUnits.description: The number of units to trade.

isBuy.description: True for a buy (long) order, false for a sell (short) order.

leverage.description: The leverage multiplier for the trade.

stopLossRate.description: The stop-loss rate at which the trade will automatically close to limit losses.

takeProfitRate.description: The take-profit rate at which the trade will automatically close to secure profits.

isTslEnabled.description: Indicates whether a trailing stop-loss is enabled.

isDiscounted.description: Indicates if the order is eligible for a discount.

mirrorId.description: ID related to mirrored trades, if applicable.

totalExternalCosts.description: Total external costs associated with the trade.

isNoTakeProfit.description: True if no take-profit is set for this order.

isNoStopLoss.description: True if no stop-loss is set for this order.

lotCount.description: The number of lots in the order.

orderId.description: Unique identifier for the closing order.

lotsToDeduct.description: The number of lots closed in this order.

positionId.description: The ID of the closed position.

lotsToDeduct.description: The number of lots closed in this order.

pendingClosePositionIds.description: IDs of positions pending close in this order.

totalItems.description: The total number of instruments matching the search criteria.

instrumentId.description: A unique identifier for the instrument.

displayname.description: The display name of the instrument.

popularityUniques7Day.description: The number of unique users who viewed this instrument in the last 7 days.

instrumentTypeID.description: The type ID of the instrument.

exchangeID.description: The ID of the exchange where the instrument is traded.

symbol.description: The trading symbol of the instrument.

isOpen.description: Indicates whether the instrument is currently open for trading.

internalInstrumentDisplayName.description: The internal display name of the instrument.

isInternalInstrument.description: Indicates whether the instrument is internal.

internalSymbolFull.description: The full internal symbol of the instrument.

isHiddenFromClient.description: Indicates whether the instrument is hidden from clients.

isDelisted.description: Indicates whether the instrument is delisted.

isCurrentlyTradable.description: Indicates whether the instrument is currently tradable.

isActiveInPlatform.description: Indicates whether the instrument is active in the platform.

isBuyEnabled.description: Indicates whether buying is enabled for the instrument.

currentRate.description: The current rate of the instrument.

lastTwoYearsPriceChange.description: The last two years price change.

popularityUniques30Day.description: The number of unique users who viewed this instrument in the last 30 days.

candlesResponse.description: Response containing historical price data in candlestick format

interval.description: Time interval of the returned candles. Matches the interval parameter from the request.

candles.description: List of candle data grouped by instrument

items.description: Candle data for a specific instrument

instrumentId.description: Identifier of the instrument these candles belong to

candles.description: List of individual candles representing price action over time

instrumentID.description: Identifier of the instrument this candle belongs to

fromDate.description: Start time of the candle period in ISO 8601 format

open.description: Opening price at the start of the candle period

high.description: Highest price reached during the candle period

low.description: Lowest price reached during the candle period

close.description: Closing price at the end of the candle period

volume.description: Trading volume during the candle period

rangeOpen.description: Opening price of the first candle in the range

rangeClose.description: Closing price of the last candle in the range

rangeHigh.description: Highest price across all candles in the range

rangeLow.description: Lowest price across all candles in the range

volume.description: Total trading volume across all candles in the range

closingPricesResponse.description: List of closing prices for all instruments

items.description: Closing price information for a specific instrument

officialClosingPrice.description: Most recent official closing price for the instrument

closingPrices.description: Historical closing prices at different time intervals

daily.description: Official closing price from the previous trading day

date.description: Date and time of the closing price in ISO 8601 format

weekly.description: Official closing price from the previous trading week

date.description: Date and time of the closing price in ISO 8601 format

monthly.description: Official closing price from the previous trading month

price.description: Closing price value. A value of -1 indicates no data available.

date.description: Date and time of the closing price in ISO 8601 format. Default date (0001-01-01) indicates no data available.

Attachment.description: Represents a media attachment in a post

url.description: URL where the attachment content can be accessed

thumbnailUrl.description: URL of a thumbnail image for video attachments

width.description: Width of the media in pixels

height.description: Height of the media in pixels

duration.description: Duration in seconds for video attachments

FeedResponse.description: Response containing a paginated list of feed posts

hasMore.description: Indicates if more posts are available beyond this page

Post.description: Represents a feed post with its content and metadata

created.description: Timestamp when the post was created

text.description: Main text content of the post

languageCode.description: Language code of the post content

updated.description: Timestamp when the post was last updated

isDeleted.description: Indicates if the post is deleted

isSpam.description: Indicates if the post is marked as spam

DiscussionCreateRequest.description: Request model for creating a new discussion post

owner.description: ID of the owner creating the discussion

message.description: The main text content of the discussion post

isDirect.description: Indicates if the mention is direct

attachments.description: List of attachments for the discussion

mediaType.description: Type of media in the attachment

WatchlistItemDto.description: Represents an item in a watchlist

ItemId.description: Unique identifier of the financial instrument

ItemRank.description: Ranking position of the item in the watchlist

Gcid.description: Global Customer ID of the watchlist owner
